section.title: TMXDetectionChamber.cc
section.programlisting: 00001 #include "TMXDetectionChamber.hh" 00002 00003 00004 // GEANT4 libraries 00005 #include "globals.hh" 00006 #include "G4SystemOfUnits.hh" 00007 #include "G4UnionSolid.hh" 00008 #include "G4Polyhedra.hh" 00009 #include "G4Tubs.hh" 00010 #include "G4VSolid.hh" 00011 #include "G4Box.hh" 00012 #include "G4NistManager.hh" 00013 #include "G4PVPlacement.hh" 00014 #include "G4Colour.hh" 00015 #include "G4VisAttributes.hh" 00016 00017 00018 TMXDetectionChamber::TMXDetectionChamber() 00019 { 00020 00021 } 00022 00023 00024 TMXDetectionChamber::TMXDetectionChamber(std::string name, TMXMaterial* surrounding) 00025 :m_motherVolume{0}, m_detName(name), m_DetectionVolume_mat(surrounding) 00026 { 00027 buildGeometry(); 00028 } 00029 00030 G4LogicalVolume *TMXDetectionChamber::getMasterVolume() 00031 { 00032 return m_motherVolume; 00033 } 00034 00035 00036 void TMXDetectionChamber::VisualisationConfig() 00037 { 00038 G4Colour red (1.0 , 0.0 , 0.0 ); // red 00039 G4Colour grayC (0.0 , 0.0 , 1.0 ); // gray 00040 00041 G4bool bool_visible = true; 00042 00043 G4VisAttributes* visDetector = new G4VisAttributes(red); 00044 visDetector->SetVisibility(bool_visible); 00045 00046 G4VisAttributes* visWorld = new G4VisAttributes(grayC); 00047 visWorld->SetVisibility(bool_visible); 00048 00049 m_motherVolume->SetVisAttributes(visWorld); 00050 m_motherVolume->GetDaughter(0)->GetLogicalVolume()->SetVisAttributes(visDetector); 00051 00052 } 00053 00054 void TMXDetectionChamber::buildGeometry( double Kelvin_Temperature) 00055 { 00056 if(m_detName.substr(0,3) == "KNK"){ 00057 00059 G4Tubs* sEnveloppe = new G4Tubs("sEnveloppe_DC", 0., 51./2, 260./2, 0., 2*M_PI); 00060 TMXMaterial* Enveloppe_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName + "_Enveloppe", 2.7*g/cm3, 1, kStateSolid, Kelvin_Temperature); 00061 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(130270, 1); //Aluminium 00062 m_motherVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sEnveloppe, 00063 Enveloppe_mat, 00064 "lEnveloppe"); 00065 00067 G4Tubs* sCoatingVolume = new G4Tubs("sReactionVolume_DC", 0., 48./2, 258./2, 0.,2* M_PI); 00068 TMXMaterial* CoatingVolume_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName + "_ReactionVolume", 8.3*g/cm3, 2, kStateSolid, Kelvin_Temperature); 00069 CoatingVolume_mat->AddElement(80160, 8); // Oxygen 00070 CoatingVolume_mat->AddElement(922350, 3); // Uranium 235 00071 G4LogicalVolume* lCoatingVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sCoatingVolume, 00072 CoatingVolume_mat, 00073 "lReactionVolume"); 00074 new G4PVPlacement(0, 00075 G4ThreeVector(0,0,0), 00076 lCoatingVolume, 00077 m_detName + "_ReactionVolume", 00078 m_motherVolume, 00079 false, 00080 0, 00081 false); 00082 G4double thickness_coating = 1.193e-2 *mm; 00083 00084 00086 00087 G4Tubs* sDetectionVolume = new G4Tubs("sDetectionVolume_DC", 0., 48./2-thickness_coating, 258./2, 0.,2* M_PI); 00088 m_DetectionVolume_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName + "_DetectionVolume", 6.05E-03*g/cm3, 3, kStateGas, Kelvin_Temperature); 00089 m_DetectionVolume_mat->AddElement(180400, 96); // Argon 40 00090 m_DetectionVolume_mat->AddElement(20040, 2); // Helium 4 00091 m_DetectionVolume_mat->AddElement(70140, 4); // DiAzote (2x2) 00092 00093 G4LogicalVolume* lDetectionVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sDetectionVolume, 00094 m_DetectionVolume_mat, 00095 "lDetectionVolume"); 00096 00097 00098 new G4PVPlacement(0, 00099 G4ThreeVector(0,0,0), 00100 lDetectionVolume, 00101 m_detName + "_DetectionVolume", 00102 m_motherVolume, 00103 false, 00104 0, 00105 false); 00106 00107 }else if(m_detName.substr(0,3) == "VOI") { 00108 00110 G4Tubs* sEnveloppe = new G4Tubs("sEnveloppe_DC", 0., 48./2, 260./2, 0., 2*M_PI); 00111 TMXMaterial* Enveloppe_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName + "_Enveloppe", 0.988052*(g/cm3) , 3, kStateLiquid, Kelvin_Temperature); 00112 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(10010,19997,"TS_H_of_Water"); 00113 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(10020, 3); 00114 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(80160,10000); 00115 m_motherVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sEnveloppe, 00116 Enveloppe_mat, 00117 "lEnveloppe"); 00118 00120 00121 G4Tubs* sDetectionVolume = new G4Tubs("sDetectionVolume_DC", 0., 44./2, 260./2, 0.,2* M_PI); 00122 00123 G4LogicalVolume* lDetectionVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sDetectionVolume, 00124 m_DetectionVolume_mat, 00125 "lDetectionVolume"); 00126 00127 new G4PVPlacement(0, 00128 G4ThreeVector(0,0,0), 00129 lDetectionVolume, 00130 m_detName + "_DetectionVolume", 00131 m_motherVolume, 00132 false, 00133 0, 00134 false); 00135 00136 }else if(m_detName.substr(0,3) == "CFU"){ 00138 G4Tubs* sMother = new G4Tubs("sMother_DC", 0., 7./2, 700./2, 0., 2*M_PI); 00139 TMXMaterial* mother_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName + "_Mother", 0.988052*(g/cm3) , 3, kStateLiquid, Kelvin_Temperature); 00140 mother_mat->AddElement(10010,19997,"TS_H_of_Water"); 00141 mother_mat->AddElement(10020, 3); 00142 mother_mat->AddElement(80160,10000); 00143 m_motherVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sMother, 00144 mother_mat, 00145 "lMother"); 00146 00148 G4Tubs* sEnveloppe = new G4Tubs("sEnveloppe_DC", 0., 7./2, 131./2, 0., 2*M_PI); 00149 TMXMaterial* Enveloppe_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName + "_Enveloppe", 7.560663*(g/cm3), 28, kStateSolid, Kelvin_Temperature); 00150 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement( 60120,0.0012); // C-12 00151 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(140280,0.009223); // Si28 00152 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(140290,0.000467); // Si29 00153 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(140300,0.00031); // Si30 00154 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(150310,0.00035); // P_31 00155 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(160320,0.00033257); // S_32 00156 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(160330,0.000002625); // S_33 00157 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(160340,0.000014735); // S_34 00158 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(160360,0.00000007); // S_36 00159 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(220460,0.00036); // Ti46 00160 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(220470,0.0003285); // Ti47 00161 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(220480,0.003321); // Fe54 00170 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(260560,0.626998); // Fe56 00171 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(260570,0.015039); // Fe57 00172 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(260580,0.001914); // Fe58 00173 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(280580,0.064673); // Ni58 00174 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(280600,0.024912); // Ni60 00175 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(280610,0.001083); // Ni61 00176 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(280620,0.003452); // Ni62 00177 Enveloppe_mat->AddElement(280640,0.000880); // Ni64 00178 G4LogicalVolume* lEnveloppeVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sEnveloppe, 00179 Enveloppe_mat, 00180 "lEnveloppe"); 00181 new G4PVPlacement(0, 00182 G4ThreeVector(0,0,-265.5), 00183 lEnveloppeVolume, 00184 m_detName + "_EnveloppeVolume", 00185 m_motherVolume, 00186 false, 00187 0, 00188 false); 00189 00191 G4Tubs* sGazeousVolume = new G4Tubs("sGaz_DC", 0., 6./2, 131./2, 0., 2*M_PI); 00192 TMXMaterial* Gaz_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName+"_Gaz", 0.11476*(g/cm3) , 2, kStateGas, Kelvin_Temperature); 00193 Gaz_mat->AddElement(180400, 100); //Argon 00194 Gaz_mat->AddElement(70140, 8); //4 percent of N2 00195 G4LogicalVolume* lGazeousVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sGazeousVolume, 00196 Gaz_mat, 00197 "lGazeousVolume"); 00198 00199 00200 new G4PVPlacement(0, 00201 G4ThreeVector(0,0,0), 00202 lGazeousVolume, 00203 m_detName + "_GazeousVolume", 00204 lEnveloppeVolume, 00205 false, 00206 0, 00207 false); 00208 00209 00210 double mass_coating_persurface = 50E-6 ; //g.cm-2 00211 double density_coating = 8.3; //g.cm-3 00212 double thickness_coating = mass_coating_persurface/density_coating; 00214 G4Tubs* sCoatingVolume = new G4Tubs("sReactionVolume_DC", 6./2- thickness_coating, 6./2, 258./2, 0.,2* M_PI); 00215 TMXMaterial* Coating_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName + "_ReactionVolume", 8.3*g/cm3, 2, kStateSolid, Kelvin_Temperature); 00216 Coating_mat->AddElement(80160, 800); // Oxygen 00217 Coating_mat->AddElement(922350, 276); // Uranium 235 00218 Coating_mat->AddElement(922340, 15); // Uranium 234 00219 Coating_mat->AddElement(922380, 9); // Uranium 234 00220 00221 G4LogicalVolume* lCoatingVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sCoatingVolume, 00222 Coating_mat, 00223 "lReactionVolume"); 00224 new G4PVPlacement(0, 00225 G4ThreeVector(0,0,0), 00226 lCoatingVolume, 00227 m_detName + "_ReactionVolume", 00228 lGazeousVolume, 00229 false, 00230 0, 00231 false); 00232 00233 00236 G4Tubs* sInsulator_DCTop = new G4Tubs("sInsuTopDC", 0., 6./2, 5./2, 0., 2*M_PI); 00237 TMXMaterial* Insulator_DC_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName+"insu_DC", 3.95*(g/cm3), 2, kStateSolid, Kelvin_Temperature); 00238 Insulator_DC_mat->AddElement(130260, 2); //Al2 00239 Insulator_DC_mat->AddElement(80160, 3); //O3 00240 G4LogicalVolume* lInsulator_DCTopVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sInsulator_DCTop, 00241 Insulator_DC_mat, 00242 "lInsulator_DCTopVolume"); 00243 new G4PVPlacement(0, 00244 G4ThreeVector(0,0,131./2-5./2), 00245 lInsulator_DCTopVolume, 00246 m_detName + "_Insulator_DCTopVolume", 00247 lGazeousVolume, 00248 false, 00249 0, 00250 false); 00252 G4Tubs* sInsulator_DCBottom = new G4Tubs("sInsuBottomDC", 0., 6./2, 19./2, 0., 2*M_PI); 00253 G4LogicalVolume* lInsulator_DCBottomVolume = new G4LogicalVolume(sInsulator_DCBottom, 00254 mother_mat, 00255 "lInsulator_DCBottomVolume"); 00256 new G4PVPlacement(0, 00257 G4ThreeVector(0,0,-350./2+19./2), 00258 lInsulator_DCBottomVolume, 00259 m_detName + "_Insulator_DCBottomVolume", 00260 m_motherVolume, 00261 false, 00262 0, 00263 false); 00265 G4Tubs* sCable = new G4Tubs("sCableDC", 0., 6./2, 550./2, 0., 2*M_PI); 00266 TMXMaterial* Cable_mat = new TMXMaterial(m_detName+"_cable", 3.58*(g/cm3), 2, kStateSolid, Kelvin_Temperature); 00267 Cable_mat->AddElement(80160, 1);
